articles.author: Jon Gambrell
articles.title: Houthi rebels say alleged US airstrike that hit Yemen prison holding African migrants kills 68 - AP News
articles.description: Yemen’s Houthi rebels say an alleged U.S. airstrike that hit a prison holding African migrants killed at least 68 people. That’s according to the Houthis’ Civil Defense organization on Monday, which said 47 others were wounded. There was no immediate independ…
articles.content: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) Yemens Houthi rebels on Monday alleged a U.S. airstrike hit a prison holding African migrants, killing at least 68 people and wounding 47 others. The U.S. military di… [+6200 chars]
